titleInfo.title: Kitty Wells, Johnny Wright, Bill Phillips, and Bobby Wright

mods.abstract: One color offset printing plate (red on silver) advertising Grand Ole Opry stars Kitty Wells, Johnny Wright and the Tennessee Mountain Boys, Bill Phillips, and Bobby Wright, available through the Harry (Hap) Peebles Agency. The plate features photographs of Kitty Wells, Johnny Wright, Bill Phillips, and Bobby Wright.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
